tag_list: larry-markovitz, affiliate-marketing, advaliant, performance-marketing, cpa, cpm, cpc, email-marketing, search-marketing, search-engine-optimization, facebook-advertising
overview: Efficient and effective, results and challenge driven, with strong business acumen and diverse knowledge of critical business areas with an emphasis on internet sales and online marketing. Recognized for tackling and resolving daily issues affecting business operations; patient, methodical, and task oriented; consistently meets or exceeds expectations. Tactical thinker, critically analyzes issues when making decisions. Works judiciously to become an expert in all projects; sets and maintains high standards. Exudes energy and confidence at the executive level. An articulate, and effective presenter, and communicator; who builds synergy and rapport with persons of all levels and backgrounds.
